Overview.name: Overview0
Overview.content:
Inheritance groups are elements that group contents. In contrast to reuse model groups and element groups, the elements can change from page to page. We explain how to use inheritance groups.

Inheritance groups are deprecated and may be removed in upcoming OpenCms versions. At the moment they are still present, but to see them in the "Add wizard", configure them in a module or sitemap configuration.

Teaser.content: (Deprecated) Inheritance groups are elements that group contents. In contrast to reuse model groups and element groups, the elements can change from page to page. We explain how to use inheritance groups.

AlkaconDocumentationTopicFrame.Keywords: content, XML, predefined types, inheritance group
